content: update 2023 follow this reddit link and a saint of a fellow crafter made a better pattern i still crochet but adhd brain i m off to quilting and more metalworking the craft community truly is amazing https //www reddit com/r/crochet/s/zxr3rxz70q opossom crochet bag holder w/ option of just a plush *photos will be in photo section thank you for taking interest into my opossom pattern this is my first ever pattern to write and to truly read update april 5th 2022 this is still my only pattern and more of a guide based on how my thought process is i never was truly educated on patterns and most of the time i will buy a pattern to give credit to the creator i than make it loosy based on how their pattern is if you dont want a free pattern there are multiple other crafters i have highly praised for making their version they do have a small fee but their pattern is amazing no issues once agian this is free thank you everyone for all the wonderful comments sorry i was unable to message everyone back i very rarely make it to this website because of crafting work and family have a wonderful day hooks needed 3 5mm 5mm yarn worsted weight arcylic yarn all sold at micheals but i feel loops and threads can be switched with red heart or joanns name brand with the same consistany and overall look -loops n thread impeccable -
